alert.note: Alert for Color Country Mountains; Grand Staircase (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 17 at 3:12PM MDT until June 18 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 496 AND 498... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 496 Color Country Mountains and Fire Weather Zone 498 Grand Staircase. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 to 13 percent both days. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated dry thunderstorms are possible along the eastern portions of 496 today. Strong and erratic outflow winds are possible. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
